title: My Fiance, The Prince, Was Having An Affair, So I Decided To Seduce The Girl He Was Cheating On Me With - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Harem   Romance   Shoujo   Shoujo Ai
tags: Antihero Protagonist   Bisexual Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Manipulative Characters   Nobles   Oneshot   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Villainess Noble Girls
author: 黒うさぎ
description:
On that day, the Duke’s Daughter Lady Nice witnessed it.

Lot, the First Prince and her fiance, was secretly meeting with the Countess’s Daughter Therese.

Therese.

Her glossy golden hair is curled into vertical drills.

Her limbs were slender yet sensual.

Her narrow emerald eyes radiated strength.

Such a charming girl is trying to steal away Nice’s fiance.

Nice need not hesitate any longer.

With her intentions known only to herself, Nice set off on the path to seducing the girl her fiance was cheating on her with.>
